name: Akki Ember-Keeper
oracle_text: Whenever a nontoken modified creature you control dies, create a 1/1 colorless Spirit creature token. (Equipment, Auras you control, and counters are modifications.)
flavor_text: "Follow my lantern, little ones."

name: Akki Ronin
oracle_text: Whenever a Samurai or Warrior you control attacks alone, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.
flavor_text:
"Carry the heat of the furnace in your steel, and never let it fade."
—Keni-Keni, akki smith

name: Akki War Paint
oracle_text:
Enchant artifact or creature
As long as enchanted permanent is a creature, it gets +2/+1.
flavor_text: Akki paint bright, bold designs on their salvaged Imperial mechs, leaving no doubt as to who they belong to now.

name: Ambitious Assault
oracle_text: Creatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn. If you control a modified creature, draw a card. (Equipment, Auras you control, and counters are modifications.)
flavor_text: In the clangor and chaos of the akki attack, few even noticed the frogs on their heads.

name: Ancestral Katana
oracle_text:
Whenever a Samurai or Warrior you control attacks alone, you may pay {1}. When you do, attach Ancestral Katana to it.
Equipped creature gets +2/+1.
Equip {3} ({3}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

name: Armguard Familiar
oracle_text:
Ward {2} (Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {2}.)
Equipped creature gets +2/+1 and has ward {2}.
Reconfigure {4} ({4}: Attach to target creature you control; or unattach from a creature. Reconfigure only as a sorcery. While attached, this isn't a creature.)

name: Automated Artificer
oracle_text: {T}: Add {C}. Spend this mana only to activate an ability or cast an artifact spell.
flavor_text:
"I sometimes watch them build more of their kind and wonder: Will there come a day when they no longer need us?"
—Saku, Futurist technician

name: Bamboo Grove Archer
oracle_text:
Defender, reach
Channel — {4}{G}, Discard Bamboo Grove Archer: Destroy target creature with flying.
flavor_text: "Do not mistake tranquility for domestication. This land is wild, and will always remain so."

oracle_text: {5}{G}: Put a +1/+1 counter on target enchantment creature. It gains trample until end of turn.
flavor_text: Members of the Living Historians don't simply chronicle the past; they embody it.

(As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter.)

card_faces.name: Imperial Moth
card_faces.flavor_text:
"The moths of Eiganjo were once no different from any other great beast of Kamigawa's wilds. It took years of patience and dedication to convince them to bear riders."

Enchant artifact or creature

oracle_text: Look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal an enchantment or land card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
flavor_text: The kami of Jukai Forest accept only the most respectful petitioners.

name: Crackling Emergence
oracle_text:
Enchant land you control
Enchanted land is a 3/3 red Spirit creature with haste. It's still a land.
If enchanted land would be destroyed, instead sacrifice Crackling Emergence and that land gains indestructible until end of turn.

oracle_text:
Choose one —

• Target opponent exiles an enchantment they control.
flavor_text: The masters weren't speaking figuratively when they said guilt could be all-consuming.

oracle_text:
Dismal Backwater enters the battlefield tapped.

{T}: Add {U} or {B}.

flavor_text: Don't fear the blade, fear the shadows.

Flying
Crew 1 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 1 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

flavor_text:
"Who cares if the story's true as long as people are entertained?"
—Shin, Towashi street performer

oracle_text:
When Ecologist's Terrarium enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Ecologist's Terrarium: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Activate only as a sorcery.

name: Eiganjo Exemplar
oracle_text: Whenever a Samurai or Warrior you control attacks alone, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Imperial samurai undergo strict training, honing their skills and purifying their spirits in the hope that they will prove worthy of a kami's blessing.

name: Era of Enlightenment // Hand of Enlightenment
type_line: Enchantment — Saga // Enchantment Creature — Human Monk

card_faces.name: Era of Enlightenment
card_faces.oracle_text:
(As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter.)
I — Scry 2.
II — You gain 2 life.
III — Exile this Saga, then return it to the battlefield transformed under your control.

card_faces.name: Hand of Enlightenment
card_faces.flavor_text:
"We have endured lifetimes of war and carved our way to peace by blade and conquest. Now, united at last under Kyodai's guidance, we lay down our weapons and open our minds."
—Aoha, general of the First Emperor

name: Experimental Synthesizer
oracle_text:
When Experimental Synthesizer enters or leaves the battlefield, exile the top card of your library. Until end of turn, you may play that card.
{2}{R}, Sacrifice Experimental Synthesizer: Create a 2/2 white Samurai creature token with vigilance. Activate only as a sorcery.

name: Explosive Entry
oracle_text: Destroy up to one target artifact. Put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature.
flavor_text: Kaito and Tamiyo charged headlong into Jin-Gitaxias's secret lab, unaware that the praetor was eagerly awaiting their arrival.

name: Fade into Antiquity
oracle_text: Exile target artifact or enchantment.
flavor_text:
"Memories fade and wither with time. If we do not nurture the garden of history, we may once more wander blindly through barren lands."
—Reki, founder of the Living Historians

name: Fang of Shigeki
oracle_text: Deathtouch
flavor_text:
"Let me give you a taste of the poison you've poured into our land."
—Shigeki, founder of the Order of Jukai

name: Favor of Jukai
oracle_text:
Enchant artifact or creature

name: Futurist Sentinel
oracle_text: Crew 3 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 3 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)
flavor_text:
"I folded a model in paper first to test the relative tensile strength of the plates."
—Katsumasa, the Animator

name: Geothermal Kami
oracle_text: When Geothermal Kami enters the battlefield, you may return an enchantment you control to its owner's hand. If you do, you gain 3 life.
flavor_text: A mysterious kami will sometimes appear to overworked monks and offer them a warm, relaxing bath.

name: Gift of Wrath
oracle_text:
Enchant artifact or creature
As long as enchanted permanent is a creature, it gets +2/+2 and has menace. (It can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

name: Golden-Tail Disciple
oracle_text: Lifelink
flavor_text: Students of the kitsune-led Golden-Tail Academy in Eiganjo are unparalleled in both martial skill and dedication to the Imperial cause.

name: Grafted Growth
oracle_text:
Enchant land
When Grafted Growth enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature or Vehicle you control.

oracle_text:
Trample
Channel — {2}{G}, Discard Greater Tanuki: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
flavor_text: The kami permit few mortals to dwell in Jukai Forest, but the clever, playful tanuki are welcomed as friends and guardians.

name: Guardians of Oboro
oracle_text:
Defender
Modified creatures you control can attack as though they didn't have defender. (Equipment, Auras you control, and counters are modifications.)
flavor_text: "The palace is closed to outsiders."

name: Harmonious Emergence
oracle_text:
Enchant land you control

flavor_text: Where the spirit and mortal realms overlap, the laws of reality are rewritten.

oracle_text: Heir of the Ancient Fang enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it if you control a modified creature. (Equipment, Auras you control, and counters are modifications.)
flavor_text: On the last day of a Jukai agent's training, they are bequeathed a powerful relic blessed by the kami.

name: Imperial Oath
oracle_text: Create three 2/2 white Samurai creature tokens with vigilance. Scry 3.
flavor_text: Those chosen to guard the Imperial Palace are not only unrivaled warriors but also lionhearted champions of the Imperial cause.

name: Imperial Subduer
oracle_text: Whenever a Samurai or Warrior you control attacks alone, tap target creature you don't control.
flavor_text: "Cease your pathetic struggling."

oracle_text:
Flying
{3}{B}: Inkrise Infiltrator gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor_text: "They can't follow your footprints if you never touch the ground."

oracle_text:
Enchant permanent

—Kenji, Sokenzan artisan

Trample, haste

name: Jukai Trainee
oracle_text: Whenever Jukai Trainee blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

name: Kami of Industry

name: Kami of Restless Shadows
oracle_text:
When Kami of Restless Shadows enters the battlefield, choose one —

• Put target creature card from your graveyard on top of your library.

name: Kami of Terrible Secrets
oracle_text: When Kami of Terrible Secrets enters the battlefield, if you control an artifact and an enchantment, you draw a card and you gain 1 life.
flavor_text: It feeds on things better left unknown, savoring the bitterness of lies and regrets.

name: Kami's Flare

name: Kindled Fury

oracle_text:
Choose one —

name: Master's Rebuke

name: Tamiyo's Safekeeping
oracle_text: Target permanent you control gains hexproof and indestructible until end of turn. You gain 2 life. (A permanent with hexproof and indestructible can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control. Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)
flavor_text: To keep the Reality Chip out of Jin-Gitaxias's hands, the Wanderer entrusted it to Tamiyo.
